topics.body:
You know how you always get those chain mail emails saying "send this and you'll meet the love of your life the next day".
What if you didn't send it and you met someone who you start to fall in love with anyway, despite not sending the email. Do you defy the laws of chain mail and become a wizard?

_I am *very* tired._

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55690f3a6368722457540600#post_55690f3a6368722457540600
Cause as good as Soul Eater was the fandom around it instantly died as soon as the show ended.  It was a good show that people remember; it's just that once the original show ended it went *pop* and all the popularity died down.

"Here lies the Soul Eater fandom":
!http://jlcauvin.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/tombstone.jpg!
